FlowGraph

Class HeaderedNodeRendererBase

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Base class for nodes with a header section and content area (React Flow style). Structure: Outer border (rounded) -> Header (semi-transparent) + Body (solid white)

public abstract class HeaderedNodeRendererBase : DataNodeRendererBase, IEditableNodeRenderer, IDataNodeRenderer, INodeRenderer

HeaderBackgroundColor

Gets the header background color. Default is glassy semi-transparent (~50% opacity). Override this in subclasses to provide accent colors.
